Source.Name: ripgrep-all
Source.Summary: ripgrep-all (rga) allows you to search PDFs, e-books, Office documents, archive formats and more
Source.Description: rga is a line-oriented search tool that allows you to look for a regex in a multitude of file types. rga wraps the awesome ripgrep and enables it to search in pdf, docx, sqlite, jpg, movie subtitles (mkv, mp4), etc.
